About StaySense Staysense is a smart app designed to help companies identify customers at risk of churning. It provides data-driven insights to support strategic decision-making, allowing companies to improve customer retention and strengthen business relationships.
Make sure the password you create is secure and hard to guess. This will replace your old password, so make sure you remember your new password well before proceeding. Change password Current password New password Re-type new password
